item.title: Vulnerability in the QR Code of the Izly phone application
item.author: Clément Gindrier
item.description: I've reported and exploited a critical vulnerability in the Izly application that allows anyone to pay for a meal with just their phone number.

item.title: Overview Of Privacytests.org
item.author: Clément Gindrier
item.description: Is privacytests.org the solution to find a browser that respects your privacy?
